Hi,

> An alternative is to write simple Learning Tests against their (live) 
> API, then use that information to program your mocks.
BTW, are there any good onsite documentation of Learning Tests?  The
only ones I can find are Kent's TDDBE review pdf.

# And JB's book only gives a reference to Kent's book.  B)
